internal_link.name: parent_nav_item
internal_link.name_friendly: Parent Nav Item (this field is used to create dropdowns for nav items. If an item is top-level then you must choose None. All items must have a selection.)

text.name: below_the_fold_title
text.name_friendly: Below the Fold Title (This title is displayed below the hero image and cards.)

wysiwyg_advanced.name: below_the_fold_content
wysiwyg_advanced.name_friendly: Below the Fold Content (This content is displayed in the 'Below the Fold' Section and can be edited to display multiple columns by using the table function in the content editor.)

yes_no.name: display_testimonials
yes_no.name_friendly: Display Testimonials (For showing the Testimonial's carousel in the Homepage, click Yes or No)

text.name: faqs_title
text.name_friendly: FAQs Title (This content displayed in the FAQs section of the Homepage)

wysiwyg_advanced.name: faqs_content
wysiwyg_advanced.name_friendly: FAQs Content (This content is displayed in the FAQs section below its title.)

images.name: faqs_image
images.name_friendly: FAQs Image (This image is displayed on the left section of the FAQs content in the Homepage.)

text.name: faqs_video
text.name_friendly: FAQs Video (Use this field to paste a link of a hosted video. For example, this can be a YouTube link or if the video is uploaded directly to Zesty then it can be it's media URL. If no video will be used then leave this field blank.)

text.name: cta_title
text.name_friendly: CTA Title (The Call to Action section is displayed directly below the FAQs section.)

images.name: cta_background_image
images.name_friendly: CTA Background Image (This image remains fixed while the user scrolls and is responsive based on screen size.)

yes_no.name: cta_image_color_overlay
yes_no.name_friendly: CTA Image Color Overlay (This function will add a color overlay to the CTA Image using the instance's selected Primary Color at 20% opacity.)

text.name: cta_button_text
text.name_friendly: CTA Button Text (This button is displayed to the right of the CTA section)

link.name: button_link_external
link.name_friendly: CTA Button Link: External (will override internal link)

yes_no.name: cta_new_tab
yes_no.name_friendly: Open CTA button link in new tab? (select whether or not you'd like the CTA Button link to open in a new tab.)
